game.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 170 ‘Turbostar’ DMU Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Class 170 Turbostar is a great modern passenger train which is perfectly at home on any UK Train Simulator route.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Class 170 Turbostar is a great modern passenger train which is perfectly at home on any UK Train Simulator route.
